column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////What a fabulous place! I loved the ambience of Bavettes. The food was delicious and incredibly filling. Marvelous wine list and creative cocktails. We tried the bone marrow
column6: and finished the celebratory meal with a large slice of carrot cake topped with goldbrick sauce. I was very pleased with choosing this steakhouse out of the others I researched. I enjoyed being able to family style our meal to try several different items. We will be back!
